item.description:
NEW SERIES STARTING WEDNESDAY MAY 11

Understanding the laws of the universe isn't easy and meditation is an essential tool to be connected to the God inside each one of us and to our own universe.  This is why the Centers of Light offer six sessions that explore the foundations of Christian Mysticism and of meditation. Open to all. No restriciton on faith. You only have to belive that there is most likely a power and intelligence that is higher than human intelligence. It is free of charge. You can start at any point in the rotation of the series. If you want more information on Christian Mysticism or the Centers of Light, check this website: http://www.centersoflight.org/what_is_christian_mysticism.html

I look forward to meeting you!

Rev. Christine
item.name: introduction on Meditation and Mysticism series
